restaurantInfo.name: Sweet and sour
restaurantInfo.description: Sweet and sour offers a variety of delicious dishes made from the freshest ingredients. Join us for a delightful dining experience.

menuItems.name: Bruschetta
menuItems.description: Grilled bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

menuItems.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
menuItems.description: Mushrooms stuffed with cheese and herbs, baked to perfection.

menuItems.name: Grilled Salmon
menuItems.description: Fresh salmon grilled and served with seasonal vegetables.

menuItems.name: Ribeye Steak
menuItems.description: Juicy ribeye steak cooked to your liking, served with mashed potatoes.

menuItems.name: Cheesecake
menuItems.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

menuItems.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menuItems.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center.

menuItems.name: Fresh Lemonade
menuItems.description: Refreshing lemonade made with fresh lemons.

menuItems.name: Iced Coffee
menuItems.description: Chilled coffee served over ice, perfect for a hot day.

menuItems.name: Garlic Bread
menuItems.description: Toasted bread topped with garlic butter and herbs.

menuItems.name: Chicken Alfredo
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken served over fettuccine pasta with creamy Alfredo sauce.

menuItems.name: Tiramisu
menuItems.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

menuItems.name: Mojito
menuItems.description: Refreshing cocktail made with lime, mint, and soda water.

menuItems.name: Mozzarella Sticks
menuItems.description: Fried mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara sauce.

menuItems.name: Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

menuItems.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menuItems.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with creamy sauce, pancetta, and Parmesan cheese.

menuItems.name: BBQ Ribs
menuItems.description: Tender pork ribs smothered in barbecue sauce, served with coleslaw and fries.

menuItems.name: Apple Pie
menuItems.description: Traditional apple pie with a flaky crust and a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

menuItems.name: Panna Cotta
menuItems.description: Italian dessert made with sweetened cream and topped with berry compote.

menuItems.name: Mango Smoothie
menuItems.description: Fresh mango smoothie made with ripe mangoes and yogurt.

menuItems.name: Hot Chocolate
menuItems.description: Rich and creamy hot chocolate topped with whipped cream.
